archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Finalize Customer Problem Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Ensure that a problem affecting the customer is solved. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory It is used to close a customer problem report when the problem affecting the customer is solved. Mandatory Change the customer problem report status to cleared. Optional Not used for this process element Interactions Not used for this process element
